body:
@artixneo
The chance that you will find a translator on this site that will be inspired to translate this merely by your comment is very slim, to say the least.

the fact that the comment state that "IF ASK FOR TRANSLATION YOU WILL DIE"its actually ironic since when you enter the sing up you already leave leave all hope, basically you already dead but have a body around your soul.....so.....i want translation.....
